Jokowi: Ratusan Ribu Cangkul Masih Impor, Kebangetan Banget!
06 Nov 2019, 11:27 by Andhika Prasetia
Jakarta - Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) menyoroti pengadaan barang cangkul yang masih impor. Ada ratusan ribu unit cangkul yang dibutuhkan.
"Ini puluhan ribu, ratusan ribu cangkul yang dibutuhkan masih impor. Apakah negara kita yang sebesar ini industrinya yang sudah berkembang benar pacul cangkul harus impor?" ujar Jokowi di Rakornas LKPP di JCC Senayan, Jakarta, Rabu (6/11/2019).
Jokowi menyayangkannya. Padahal di Indonesia masih terjadi defisit transaksi berjalan.
"Enak banget itu negara yang di mana barang itu kita impor. Kita ini masih defisit transaksi berjalan, defisit neraca perdagangan, masih impor. Impor itu enak karena harganya lebih murah," kata Jokowi.
Jokowi juga mendorong produk lokal masuk e-catalog LKPP. Ia mengusulkan pengki buatan lokal masuk e-catalog LKPP.
"Tadi saya bisa kok yang enggak standar masuk e-catalog, kayak cikrak. Bagus. Jangan hanya cikrak. Barang lain yang dibutuhkan masukan," ujarnya.
Jokowi meminta pengadaan barang impor langsung dicoret. Sebab, negara masih defisit dan pemerintah yang menanggung utang.
"Kalau yang impor langsung stabilo merah saja nggak usah. Lah gimana kita masih senang impor padahal kita defisit neraca perdagangan. Cadangan kita masih defisit. Kok kita masih hobi impor? Ya kebangetan banget. Uangnya pemerintah lagi. Kebangetan banget," ujar Jokowi.

Jokowi: Hundreds of Thousands of Hoes Are Still Imported, Too Late!
Nov 6, 2019, 11:27 by Andhika Prasetia
Jakarta - President Joko Widodo (Jokowi) highlighted the procurement of imported hoe. There are hundreds of thousands of hoe units needed.
"This is tens of thousands, hundreds of thousands of hoes needed are still imported. Does our country which is as big as this industry that has developed really hoe hoe should import?" said Jokowi at the National Coordination Meeting of LKPP at JCC Senayan, Jakarta, Wednesday (11/06/2019).
Jokowi regretted it. Though in Indonesia there is still a current account deficit.
"It's really delicious that the country where we imported goods. We are still in the current account deficit, the trade balance deficit, still importing. Imports are good because the prices are cheaper," Jokowi said.
Jokowi also pushed local products into the LKPP e-catalog. He proposed a locally made dustpan for LKPP e-catalog.
"Earlier I was able to not enter the e-catalog standard, like a cikrak. Good. Don't just cikrak. Other items needed input," he said.
Jokowi requested that procurement of imported goods be immediately dropped. Because the country is still in deficit and the government bears the debt.
"If the direct import of the red highlighter doesn't need to be done. How do we still like to import even though we have a trade balance deficit. Our reserves are still deficit. How come we are still importing hobbies?
